header: Short info about the website and login procedure
title: Creator sign-up

card.description: Please enter your e-mail address. We will send you a e-mail to verify your address.

verification.title: Verification
verification.subtitle: We sent you an e-mail to verify control of your address.

error.send-email: Apologies for the inconvenience. We encountered an issue on our end preventing the email from being sent. Please try again later.
